item.title: Texas measles outbreak grows to 279 cases mostly among unvaccinated, unknown status
item.description: The measles outbreak in western Texas has grown to a total of 279 cases, according to new state data published Tuesday.

item.title: Chief Justice John Roberts pushes back against Trump's call to impeach judge
item.description: President Donald Trump is ramping up criticism of U.S. District Judge Jeb Boasberg.

item.title: Schumer defends vote to avert shutdown and his position as Senate Democratic leader
item.description: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer defends his vote with Republicans to keep the government open and his position as leader in an appearance on â€œThe...

item.title: WATCH: Who invented the March Madness bracket? A debate rages
item.description: The concept of filling out a bracket with your picks for the NCAA tournament may have started at a bar in Staten Island, New York.

item.title: Trump speaks with Putin on Ukraine ceasefire proposal
item.description: Dan Scavino, the deputy chief of staff, posted on X that the call was "going well."
